snippet: The natural gas leak at a well in the French oil company’s flagship Elgin-Franklin field resulted from corrosion that produced stress cracks, the company said.
abstract: French oil company Total discloses findings of its investigation into causes of natural gas leak at a well in North Sea, which has shut down production on company’s flagship Elgin-Franklin field for almost a year; reports that gas leak resulted from corrosion that produced stress cracks.
lead_paragraph: The natural gas leak at a well in the French oil company’s flagship Elgin-Franklin field resulted from corrosion that produced stress cracks, the company said.

headline.seo: Total Discloses Origins of North Sea Gas Leak
headline.main: Total Discloses Origins of a Gas Leak in the North Sea
headline.print_headline: Total Discloses Origins of a Gas Leak in the North Sea
